homeCarousel.title: Graphics Design
homeCarousel.description: Master the art of graphic design with comprehensive lessons covering design principles, software proficiency, and practical applications.

homeCarousel.title: Web Design & Development
homeCarousel.description: Explore the fundamentals of web design and development, from HTML/CSS basics to responsive layouts and backend technologies, led by industry experts.

homeCarousel.title: Digital Marketing
homeCarousel.description: Master the strategies and tactics of digital marketing, covering SEO, social media, content marketing, and analytics to drive online success.

homeCarousel.title: Microsoft Office
homeCarousel.description: Gain proficiency in Microsoft Office suite - Excel, Word, PowerPoint, and more, enhancing productivity and efficiency in your professional tasks.

homeCarousel.title: Computer Fundamental
homeCarousel.description: Explore the fundamentals of computing - hardware, software, and basic operations, empowering you to navigate the digital landscape with confidence.

homeCarousel.title: Video Editing & Photography
homeCarousel.description: Learn the art of video editing - from basic techniques to advanced software usage, creating captivating visual content for various platforms.
